blogPost.excerpt: Jumpstart your next SaaS product with Bedrock: the modern full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate with user authentication, subscription payments, teams, invitations, emails and everything else you need
blogPost.body: Jumpstart your next SaaS product with Bedrock: the modern full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate with user authentication, subscription payments, teams, invitations, emails and everything else you need
blogPost.title: Bedrock - Full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate for SaaS products
blogPost.author: Nik Graf

localize.description: 使用Bedrock启动您的下一个SaaS产品：现代的全栈Next.js和GraphQL模板，具有用户认证、订阅支付、团队、邀请、电子邮件和其他一切您需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 用于SaaS产品的全栈Next.js和GraphQL模板。

localize.description: 使用Bedrock啓動您的下一個SaaS產品：現代的全棧Next.js和GraphQL模板，具有用戶認證、訂閱支付、團隊、邀請、電子郵件和其他一切您需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 用於SaaS產品的全棧Next.js和GraphQL模板。

previous.excerpt: Community Weekly is a newsletter for creators that are seeking to make their content profitable. We offer our subscribers resources and playbooks to help them go from 0 to HERO.

localize.description: 社区周报》是为那些正在寻求让自己的内容盈利的创作者而设的通讯。我们为订阅者提供资源和游戏手册，帮助他们从0到HERO。

localize.description: 社區週報》是爲那些正在尋求讓自己的內容盈利的創作者而設的通訊。我們爲訂閱者提供資源和遊戲手冊，幫助他們從0到HERO。
localize.tagline: 學會發展和貨幣化你的社區

next.excerpt: purME Air is a powered mask that makes breathing safer and easier. Breathe only filtered air supplied by twin turbines. Block out 99.5% of microorganisms with FFP1, N95 and P100 filters. Sterilize your mask in under 5 minutes with a built-in UV-C unit.
next.title: purME Air - Face mask that makes your breathing super safe and easy

localize.description: purME Air是一款让呼吸更安全、更轻松的动力面罩。只呼吸由双涡轮提供的过滤空气。使用FFP1、N95和P100过滤器，可阻隔99.5%的微生物。使用内置的UV-C装置在5分钟内对面罩进行消毒。
localize.tagline: 让您的呼吸超安全、超轻松的面罩。

localize.description: purME Air是一款讓呼吸更安全、更輕鬆的動力面罩。只呼吸由雙渦輪提供的過濾空氣。使用FFP1、N95和P100過濾器，可阻隔99.5%的微生物。使用內置的UV-C裝置在5分鐘內對面罩進行消毒。
localize.tagline: 讓您的呼吸超安全、超輕鬆的面罩。
